title: An error occurred while initializing the debugger.
body:
- [ ] I've [opened a support ticket](https://trufflesuite.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) before filing this issue.

---------------------------

## Issue
An error occurred while initializing the debugger. Often errors can be caused by being connected to the incorrect network for a specific transaction. Ensure you have MetaMask connected to the appropriate network for your transaction. See the error below for more information.
base fee exceeds gas limit (vm hf=shanghai -> block -> tx)

## Steps to Reproduce

Please provide the shortest amount of steps to reproduce your issue.

## Expected Behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual Results
![屏幕截图 2023-07-22 124524](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/assets/126786904/b76ea4d8-439c-46c2-a242-6f7a9b4cdb37)


## Environment

* Operating System:  Windows 11 
* Ethereum client:
* Truffle version (`truffle version`):  v5.11.0
* node version (`node --version`): v18.16.1
* npm version (`npm --version`): 9.5.1
* Ganache v7.9.0
* Solidity v0.5.16 (solc-js)
* Web3.js v1.10.0
* Chain version : Arbitrun
